title: Support Worker Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Brain Injury Services
Interview Descriptions: Average interview questions and overall good no complaints no issues through out the process and was easy communication. Not much else to say on it. Would recommend always looking up comoany before hand and prep is key,

title: Support Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Brain Injury Services (London, England) in Sept 2016
Interview Descriptions: Not too difficult, they basically check that you are able to care for a person and you what is right an wrong. The process is not long but very few spaces are available
Interview Questions: when have you shown that you can care for someone before ?
